author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...LOPSIDED FERNAND JOGGING A LITTLE EASTWARD... ...STILL FORECAST TO BECOME POST-TROPICAL IN A DAY OR SO...
summary: ...LOPSIDED FERNAND JOGGING A LITTLE EASTWARD... ...STILL FORECAST TO BECOME POST-TROPICAL IN A DAY OR SO... As of 5:00 AM AST Wed Aug 27 the center of Fernand was located near 38.3, -50.8 with movement E at 12 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1007 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 45 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Fernand (AT1/AL062025)
